author: bridge-bot
content: <katya_rz> Hello Lean teams, could you please confirm that the syncing mechanism is integrated into your clients and working properly? I need to understand the current status for long-running devnets.

author: bridge-bot
content: <katya_rz> By working properly I mean expected to work properly

author: bridge-bot
content: <salakhiev> Syncing works for qlean<->qlean networks, but we couldn't verify it is compatibility with other clients yet

author: bridge-bot
content: <uink45> We have this functionality in place, however, are yet to test this with other client implementations. Will confirm with this by performing local testing soon.
